name: REVISIONS
description:
Play through the creator's memories in this quirky narrative game! If you like your protagonists sassy and yellow, this is your game! If you like metafictional twists, this is also your game! It's like Dys4ia meets The Beginner's Guide meets Annie Hall meets Fez (but not as good as those games, haha...)

... with a confident sales pitch like that, how can you say no?

(As seen at IndieCade 2016, Indie Prize, Out of Index, A.Maze, QGCon, Meaningful Play)
